# File lib/bit-struct/bit-struct.rb, line 258
    def describe(fmt = nil, opts = {})
      if block_given?
        fields.each do |field|
          field.describe(opts) do |desc|
            yield desc
          end
        end
        nil
        
      else
        fmt ||= describe_format

        result = []

        unless opts[:omit_header]
          result << fmt % ["byte", "type", "name", "size", "description"]
          result << "-"*70
        end

        fields.each do |field|
          field.describe(opts) do |desc|
            result << fmt % desc
          end
        end

        unless opts[:omit_footer]
          result << @note if @note
        end

        result
      end
    end
